post.text: Truly honored to receive the first ever presidential endorsement from the Bay of Pigs Veterans Association. #MAGA #ImWithYou

comment.author: Christopher
comment.text: Curious that the kennedys remain silent during this election. Does it have to do with killery and John Jrs unfortunate accident? When he was going to run as Senator against her?

replies.author: Sydney
replies.text: No offense, but who's left of the Kennedys? Caroline and cousin Maria Shriver. Look how corrupt the Kennedy Clan was

replies.author: Christopher
replies.text: Apparently not as corrupt as the Clinton crime family

replies.author: Brandi
replies.text: Jeezus - who's death are you going to blame Hillary on next? John Lennon? Martin Luther King? Do you people even listen to yourselves?

replies.author: Christopher
replies.text: Actually, I'm hoping its you Brandi troll.
